hero.titleDescription: Artisanal cookies made with real butter, intense flavors, and a nostalgic touch that makes you fall in love.

vainilla.name: Vanilla Chips
vainilla.description: Classic vanilla cookie filled with Hershey’s chocolate chips, topped with chocolate ganache and a white chocolate pearl.

chocolate.name: Intense Chocolate
chocolate.description: For true chocolate lovers: an elegant cocoa cookie filled with Hershey’s chocolate chips, topped with chocolate ganache and cocoa.

red.name: Red Velvet
red.description: Enjoy an eternal holiday vibe with this innovative take on the classic Red Velvet cookie, filled with cranberries and topped with powdered sugar and cranberries.

marmoleada.name: Marbled
marmoleada.description: Enjoy the best of both worlds: vanilla and cocoa with Hershey’s chocolate chips filling, topped with chocolate ganache and walnuts.

matcha.name: Matcha
matcha.description: A cookie with intense flavors, made with matcha, filled with white chocolate and coconut, topped with white chocolate and coconut.

oreo.name: Oreo
oreo.description: A bakery classic: delicious vanilla cookie with Oreo pieces and topped with a whole Oreo cookie.

pop.name: Pop Caramel
pop.description: An explosion of flavors: vanilla cookie with cajeta, filled with dark and white chocolate, topped with royal icing and popcorn.

taro.name: Unicorn Taro
taro.description: The unique flavor of taro combined with sliced almonds, topped with royal icing and marshmallows.

reyes.name: Reyes
reyes.description: This limited-edition cookie adds an innovative twist to our classic cookie by replacing the topping with white chocolate and fruit paste.

chocolateNuezChocolate.name: Chocolate Ring Cake with Walnuts
chocolateNuezChocolate.description: Fluffy cocoa ring cake with chopped walnuts, topped with chocolate ganache.

chocolateNuezChocolateGlass.name: Chocolate Ring Cake with Walnuts and Powdered Sugar
chocolateNuezChocolateGlass.description: Fluffy cocoa ring cake with chopped walnuts, topped with powdered sugar.

panqueZanahoria.name: Carrot Loaf Cake
panqueZanahoria.description: Soft carrot loaf cake made with cream.

cafe.name: Coffee Cake
cafe.description: Moist coffee cake soaked with coffee liqueur and topped with coffee frosting.

cocoFrutosRojos.name: Coconut Cake with Red Berries
cocoFrutosRojos.description: Three-milk style coconut cake with red berries and coconut topping.

moka.name: Mocha Cake
moka.description: Three-milk style mocha cake topped with chocolate ganache.

tips.sweetnessDesc: Each cake has its own sweetness level so you can choose exactly what you like.
tips.portionsDesc: Portions designed to share and enjoy.
tips.ingredientsDesc: We make every cake using real butter, fresh eggs, and high-quality ingredients. Everything is homemade, with no premixes or shortcuts.
tips.orderDesc: To ensure flavor, texture, and finish, orders must be placed at least 1 day in advance.

contact.important: Your opinion is very important to us
contact.title: Cookies for Your Events
contact.description: We quote custom orders for events, corporate gifts, and celebrations. Write to us and let’s create something delicious together.

comingSoon.comingDesc: Very soon you’ll find a new experience here, thoughtfully crafted.
